item.title: Desegregate. Now You Can.
item.description:
Nowadays, it’s easier and cheaper to create your own website or blog. Every corner store can share its prices with the entire planet.

For a quantitative economist, this “corner store” is like a playground of endless possibilities.

Before we had onIn the past, only a few marketplaces published food prices—like Ceagesp anb local Ceasas in major Brazilian cities—and some institutions, such as ESALQ focused on commodity prices in selected regions. Now, we can be more ambitious and scrape retail or wholesale prices for any desired location worldwide.
